viewer.issue: Report a problem with this building

BuildingInfo.attr1: Attribute descriptions you can find in the

download.webservicespar: These allow you to explore the entire dataset in another software (eg. QGIS) without having to download anything beforehand. Note that only the 2D projection of the models is served via WMS/WFS.
download.webservices_warning: The old API endpoint (https://data.3dbag.nl/api/BAG3D_v2) will be deprecated after the next release!
download.staticpar: To keep filesizes manageable the 3DBAG dataset is subdived in tiles. For each tile we offer the data in a number of different file formats. Use the button below to select the tile of interest to see the download options.
download.metadatapar: This JSON file contains metadata about the 3DBAG dataset including detailed information about the software used to generate 3DBAG and the source datasets. The schema of the metadata file loosely follows the ISO 19115 metadata standard. However, it has been converted to JSON and adapted to better fit our needs. Under `identificationInfo` we report the current version number, contact information and license of the 3DBAG. Under `dataQualityInfo.lineage` we report the versions of the source datasets and the versions of the processing software that were used for the current release.
download.gpgkdumppar: The GPKG file below contains the 3DBAG data for the whole of the Netherlands. Beware, this is a very large file to download. The file is compressed as Seek-Optimized ZIP, see the documentation on how to access it without decompressing it first.
download.selectedtilefalse: Select a tile from the map
download.tile_index_par: Alternatively you can access the complete tile index directly.
